markdownRemark.html:
Here’s a data visualization I made of nonfarm employment in the U.S. by industry sector. You can click on any box to zoom in. The data was sourced from the BLS and is from January 2016.

This is a very rough first draft that I will be expanding upon, but figured I’d upload what I’ve done so far.

The chart itself was made with D3.js.

frontmatter.title: Employment by Industry Sector in the U.S. (Visualization)
